languages.text: "У настоящего Вольного Торговца всегда должно быть при себе живое оружие. Хотя тебе ли это говорить — ты поставил{mf||а} себе на службу убийцу из культа смерти! Неплохо, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}, но мой Вортен поопаснее твоей фанатички будет".

"A true Rogue Trader always keeps a living weapon close at hand. But you don't need me to tell you that — you have a death cult assassin in your employ! Not bad, new blood, but I would wager my Worten has a meaner bite than that zealot of yours."
languages.original_text: "У настоящего Вольного Торговца всегда должно быть при себе живое оружие. Хотя тебе ли это говорить — ты поставил{mf||а} себе на службу убийцу из культа смерти! Неплохо, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}, но мой Вортен поопаснее твоей фанатички будет".

traits.locale_text: "A true Rogue Trader always keeps a living weapon close at hand. But you don't need me to tell you that — you have a death cult assassin in your employ! Not bad, new blood, but I would wager my Worten has a meaner bite than that zealot of yours."
traits.speaker: Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "A true Rogue Trader always keeps a living weapon close at hand. But you don't need me to tell you that — you have a death cult assassin in your employ! Not bad, new blood, but I would wager my Worten has a meaner bite than that zealot of yours."
traits.speaker: Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "A true Rogue Trader always keeps a living weapon close at hand. But you don't need me to tell you that — you have a death cult assassin in your employ! Not bad, new blood, but I would wager my Worten has a meaner bite than that zealot of yours."

languages.text: « {mf|Un libre-marchand|Une libre-marchande} digne de ce nom doit toujours conserver une arme vivante à portée de main. Mais visiblement, vous le savez déjà, puisque vous vous promenez avec un assassin du culte de la mort à vos côtés ! Pas mal, {mf|le|la} novice, mais si je devais parier, je dirais que mon Worten mord plus fort que votre petite zélote. »
languages.original_text: "A true Rogue Trader always keeps a living weapon close at hand. But you don't need me to tell you that — you have a death cult assassin in your employ! Not bad, new blood, but I would wager my Worten has a meaner bite than that zealot of yours."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Un libre-marchand|Une libre-marchande} digne de ce nom doit toujours conserver une arme vivante à portée de main. Mais visiblement, vous le savez déjà, puisque vous vous promenez avec un assassin du culte de la mort à vos côtés ! Pas mal, {mf|le|la} novice, mais si je devais parier, je dirais que mon Worten mord plus fort que votre petite zélote. »
traits.speaker: Winterscale

languages.text: «Todo Comerciante Independiente que se precie tiene un arma viva a mano. Aunque ya veo que tiene a una asesina del culto de la Muerte a su lado, ¡así que no sé para qué se lo digo! No está mal, sangre fresca, pero apostaría a que mi Worten es más feroz que esa fanática suya».
languages.original_text: "A true Rogue Trader always keeps a living weapon close at hand. But you don't need me to tell you that — you have a death cult assassin in your employ! Not bad, new blood, but I would wager my Worten has a meaner bite than that zealot of yours."

traits.locale_text: «Todo Comerciante Independiente que se precie tiene un arma viva a mano. Aunque ya veo que tiene a una asesina del culto de la Muerte a su lado, ¡así que no sé para qué se lo digo! No está mal, sangre fresca, pero apostaría a que mi Worten es más feroz que esa fanática suya».
traits.speaker: Winterscale

languages.text: 「真の自由開拓者は、常に生きた武器を近くに控えておくものだ。まぁ、私に言われるまでもないな。デスカルト・アサシンを側に置いているようだ！ 悪くない…新しい血か。だが、うちのヴォルテンはお前の熱心な家来よりも意地が悪いぞ」
languages.original_text: "A true Rogue Trader always keeps a living weapon close at hand. But you don't need me to tell you that — you have a death cult assassin in your employ! Not bad, new blood, but I would wager my Worten has a meaner bite than that zealot of yours."

traits.locale_text: 「真の自由開拓者は、常に生きた武器を近くに控えておくものだ。まぁ、私に言われるまでもないな。デスカルト・アサシンを側に置いているようだ！ 悪くない…新しい血か。だが、うちのヴォルテンはお前の熱心な家来よりも意地が悪いぞ」
traits.speaker: Winterscale

languages.text: “真正的行商浪人，手边总会放一件活生生的武器。不过看起来，这个道理根本用不着我教，你身边居然带了个拜死教的刺客！干得不错，新来的，不过我敢打赌，我的沃尔腾咬起人来比你那个狂热分子更凶。”
languages.original_text: "A true Rogue Trader always keeps a living weapon close at hand. But you don't need me to tell you that — you have a death cult assassin in your employ! Not bad, new blood, but I would wager my Worten has a meaner bite than that zealot of yours."

traits.locale_text: “真正的行商浪人，手边总会放一件活生生的武器。不过看起来，这个道理根本用不着我教，你身边居然带了个拜死教的刺客！干得不错，新来的，不过我敢打赌，我的沃尔腾咬起人来比你那个狂热分子更凶。”
traits.speaker: Winterscale

languages.text: "Wahre Freihändler führen immer eine lebende Waffe in ihrer Nähe mit. Aber ich muss Euch nicht sagen, dass ... sich in Euren Diensten eine Todeskult-Assassinin befindet! Neues Blut ist nicht schlecht, aber ich möchte wetten, dass mein Worten härter zubeißt als Eure Eiferin."
languages.original_text: "A true Rogue Trader always keeps a living weapon close at hand. But you don't need me to tell you that — you have a death cult assassin in your employ! Not bad, new blood, but I would wager my Worten has a meaner bite than that zealot of yours."

traits.locale_text: "Wahre Freihändler führen immer eine lebende Waffe in ihrer Nähe mit. Aber ich muss Euch nicht sagen, dass ... sich in Euren Diensten eine Todeskult-Assassinin befindet! Neues Blut ist nicht schlecht, aber ich möchte wetten, dass mein Worten härter zubeißt als Eure Eiferin."
traits.speaker: Winterscale
